response.overview: There are 14 million obese teenagers in the USA, four times more than 30 years ago. But for those who can afford it, thereâ€™s a solution. Camp Pocono, two hours away from New York, is the biggest fat camp in the country. Every summer, 400 children are sent there and put through a tightly regimented routine, a strict diet and gruelling sessions of cardio. We follow some of them during their three month stay there. Will the camp meet all their expectations?
response.tagline: Inside America's Biggest Fat Camp: Fighting the US Teen Obesity Crisis
response.title: Fat Camps
